robot_player.description: A client broker representing a player of the game driven by AI.

human_player.description: A client broker representing a human player of the game.

player_avatar.description: A client broker representing a game world avatar driven by a human or robot player.

npc_avatar.description: A client broker representing a game avatar not driven by a human or robot player. A Non-Player Character. For example, a non-sentient animal, or a stock character with limited actions.

map_context_object.description: A client broker representing a non-Player game object that is relatively more static than a NPC. For example, a building, a tree, an organizational ledger, an automatic town crier.
